sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function DisplayScore(props) { const scoreText = [ 'Dumb all over', "Jesus Thinks You're A Jerk", "Dancin' fool", 'Cosmik Debris', "Shut up 'n play your guitar", 'The Meek Shall Inherit Nothing', "Tryin' To Grow A Chin", 'Rudy Wants To Buy Yez A Drink', 'Wowie Zowie', 'Wild love', 'The man from Utopia!', ] const scoreComment = () => { return scoreText[props.totalScore()] } return (
You scored {props.totalScore()} out of {props.qAmount}
{scoreComment()}
) } export default DisplayScore
